tag_list: marketing, translation, dtp, saas, cloud, kexino, qarto, video, presentations
overview:
Gee Ranasinha is Founder / CEO of KEXINO, a marketing services company based in Strasbourg, North-Eastern France.

Prior to KEXINO, he was Director of Marketing (Worldwide) for Dalim Software, a developer of software for the printing and publishing industries.

Born and raised in London, he now lives in France with his wife and son. His hobbies include cooking, technology, Hi-Fi, photography and playing jazz piano very badly.
